title: Mazhakaatha Lyrics Oru Oorla Rendu Raja Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Mazhakaatha Suththi Adikka Lyrics
Singer(s): Haricharan, Vandhana Srinivasan, Maria Roe Vincent
Lyrics: Yugabharathi

Mazhakaatha suththi adikka
nenjukulla minnal adikkudhadi.
adhirr vaettaa nee enna vedikka
kannukulla sanda nadakkudhadaa.

nee sollura sollulla thaaney
kadun kaththiri veyilu naaney
kulir aanaen.

Nee siyura anbula thaanae
pani kottura panguni naanae
pachcha neruppaanen viruppaanen
sevappaanen.

Mazhakaatha suththi adikka
nenjukulla minnal adikkudhadi.
adhirr vaettaa nee enna vedikka
kannukulla sanda nadakkudhadaa.

Manasu solluradha odambu kaettka
marandhu poyidudhey una naan paakka
moochu kaathtthaa, unakkul poondhaen.
kaalam pooraa iruppaen serndhae

allikoduthida anbu irukkayil
uzhagae pudhusaachu
innu edhukku nee vanbu
valakkura thodavaa

Mazhakaatha suththi adikka
nenjukulla minnal adikkudhadi.
adhirr vaettaa nee enna vedikka
kannukulla sanda nadakkudhadaa.

Azhagaa puththagamaa pozhudhum vaasi
kadaisi pakkam vara mulusaa naesi.
paavi neethaan edhayo paesi
kelvi kaettaa sariyaa yosi

Vandha vazhiyila sellum varayila
payanam mudiyaadhu.
Nammbi nadandhida undhan
nizhaula thodarvaen.

Mazhakaatha suththi adikka
nenjukulla minnal adikkudhadi.
adhirr vaettaa nee enna vedikka
kannukulla sanda nadakkudhadaa.
